item.title: My talk at PyCon Italy
item.description: I’ve been giving a talk on Vulture for almost half a decade now. It takes me new places, and teaches me new things, and I quite like it. This time, it was even more special – it was in Italy. And rather than focussing on Vulture specifically, I wanted to spend more time on automated code analysis in general. I also wanted to have a nice ice-breaker to loosen up the awkwardness which is generally present in technical conferences.
